prompt.task_guidelines: You are an expert at extracting Location, Organization, Person, and Miscellaneous entities from text. Your job is to extract named entities mentioned in text, grouped by entity type.
prompt.output_guidelines:
You will return the extracted attributes as a json with the following keys:
{attribute_json}. Don't output anything other than the final JSON in your response.

attributes.name: Location
attributes.description: A list containing all instances of locations in the input. Output an empty list if no such entities exist.

attributes.name: Organization
attributes.description: A list containing all instances of all organizations in the input. Output an empty list if no such entities exist.

attributes.name: Person
attributes.description: A list containing all instances of all people in the input. Output an empty list if no such entities exist.

attributes.name: Miscellaneous
attributes.description: A list containing all instances of all miscellaneous entities in the input. Output an empty list if no such entities exist.
